metadata.title: CVE-2023-3362 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An information disclosure issue in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions from16.0 prior to 16.0.6, and version 16.1.0 allows unauthenticated actors toaccess the import error information if a project was imported from GitHub.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
